citeinfo.origin: University of Hawaii, Dept. of Oceanography, Sea Level Center, Sea Level
citeinfo.title: NOAA/NODC Sea Level Height CD-ROM

descript.abstract:
sea level heights
Tropical Pacific (TOGA) area and global
Custodian "Mr. Patrick Caldwell Data Manager - Joint Archive for Sea Level University of Hawaii Sea Level Center Dept. of Oceanography University of Hawaii, MSB 317 Honolulu, Hawaii 96822 USA E-mail: caldwell@kapau.soest.hawaii.edu Telex: 6502478678 (use mainland U.S. access code) Fax: 808-956-2352 or 808-956-4104 Office Phone: 808-956-4105 or NODC - National Oceanographic Data Center User Services Branch, E/OC21 SSMC3, 4th Floor 1315 East-West Highway Silver Spring, Maryland 20910-3282 Telephone: (301)713-3277 FAX: (301)713-3302 Internet : services@nodc.noaa.gov"
Other Comments includes TOGA project data plus contents of the Permanent Service for Mean Sea Level as of August 1994.
Base Internet/URL ( http://www.nodc.noaa.gov ) ( http://www.nodc.noaa.gov/General/NODC-cdrom.html )
[ A TCODE project ]

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
